item.title: [REQ] 2 webscripts (PHP or similar)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I need a script to compress and download all .txt files in a certain folder, this is for the pastebin so I can open a page and it will allow me to save all posts to my computer in a compressed format

I also need a script to backup a mysql db given the db name and db user and pass, this needs to get the whole thing and preferably compress it (it doesnt have to compress it), it also has to wait on the sql server if it times out or loses connection, is this possible?

if anyone could write or find these scripts I would be very very appreciative

Read full topic
